properties.address: Suckley Church, Church Lane, Suckley, Worcester WR6 5DE
properties.description: We have been open every Wednesday since November 16th 2022. From 12md to 4pm we offer a Warm Welcome with good company and refreshments (free of charge). Most people enjoy just the company and a chat. Young families enjoy that there is always something for them too. We try and have 'something for everyone' with books and mags and multi-age jigsaw puzzles. We sometimes use the big screen TV too.
properties.title: Suckley Church Space

properties.description: Community Cafe Free or donation tea, coffee, cake and a chat if you'd like.
properties.title: The Granary

properties.address: Sawmill Walk, The Butts, Worcester, Worcestershire WR1 3DP
properties.description: Our library offers a large collection of books for adults and children, free WiFi and access to computers. We host regular activities for children, many of which are free. We have a cafe onsite. Located in the city centre we are easily accessible by public transport. Public carparks nearby
properties.title: The Hive

properties.description: Our classroom area in the Craft Room is quiet and open to all for a hot drink, a warm through and a lap blanket which we'd love for you to take home. Bring your crafting if you do it, or read through our craft magazines.
properties.title: The Stitchery

properties.address: Welland Parish Hall, Gloucester Road, Welland, Malvern, Worcestershire WR13 6LA
properties.description: A place to meet up with friends, and also access useful services including Worcestershire Libraries, is located in Welland Village Hall. Serving people in Welland and the surrounding villages including the Hanleys, Welland's Social Space and Library offers a lovely space to meet up with friends for a coffee, and also to access important services without having to travel to Malvern or Upton. On offer all year round is a "Help yourself" table of hot & cold drinks & biscuits, free high speed wifi, popular "Magazine Swap" table, kids colouring activities, lego and board games, and access to most of Worcestershire library's services (you can even return books that you have borrowed from any of the other libraries in Worcestershire). In addition, through the year, there is a programme of special events, including activities and competitions for children, and also valuable opportunities to access useful services right here within the village, such as those provided by Citizen's Advice, Age UK and West Mercia Police. Information about these will be available on the Parish Council website's News page and its Facebook site as well as on posters on the village hall and village notice board next to the shop. All are welcome at Welland Social Space and Library - you don't have to be a member of the library to come along. Dogs on leads also welcome. Open weekly M 2.30-4.30pm, W 8.30-10.30am, Th 10am-12pm & monthly 10am-12pm on 3rd Sat. Closed Bank Hols & Christmas week. Worcs library services available, also hot & cold drinks, cake/biscuits, kids colouring activities, & free magazine swap table.
properties.title: Welland Social Space and Library

properties.address: Church Street, Malvern, England, WR14 2AY, United Kingdom
properties.description: Free Food/Drink, People to chat to, Wheelchair Accessible, Toilets, Child Friendly, We offer a warm, welcoming space, serving free coffee and biscuits.
